means: 天照大神（神道教最重要的神，即太阳女神，被认为是日本皇室家族的祖先）

sentence.Network_en: Amaterasu's main sanctuary is situated on Ise, on the island of Honshu.
sentence.Network_cn: 天照的主要圣殿坐落在伊势,即本州岛上.

sentence.Network_en: The laughter of the gods when they watched her comical and obscene dances aroused Amaterasu's curiosity.
sentence.Network_cn: 众神们看到思金神跳起滑稽、淫荡的舞蹈,发出一阵阵大笑,笑声激起了天照的好奇心.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Ama no Oshihi天忍日amaterasu天照大神amazake甘酒
amate 氨基甲酸的, amaterasu 天照, amate 阿马特

means.word_mean: 1. central deity of Shinto; goddess personifying the sun and ancestress of the rulers of Japan
